caller_intent: The caller intends to make a one-time payment of $78.61 for a National General policy using a friend's debit card, as their own card is temporarily inactive.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's intent to make a payment and verified the amount ($78.61).
Caller explained their own card was inactive and requested to use a friend's card for a one-time payment.
Agent confirmed the use of the friend's card for a single transaction.
Agent collected the friend's debit card details (number, expiration date, and CVV).
Agent processed the payment and provided a confirmation number (034035).
Agent informed the caller that the recipient (Mr. Delgado) would receive an email voucher confirming the payment.
knowledge_required: Payment processing procedures for one-time transactions
Handling card-on-file issues and temporary card inactivity
Verification of card details for security purposes
systems_referenced: Payment processing platform (implied by card verification and transaction steps)
Email notification system for payment confirmation
summary: A caller successfully made a one-time payment of $78.61 for a National General policy using a friend's debit card after their own card was temporarily inactive. The agent verified the card details, processed the payment, and provided a confirmation number. The recipient was to receive an email voucher for the transaction.
